snippet: France easily defeated Uzbekistan, cementing its status as one of the tournament favorites, and Felipe Avenatti scored in extra time to give Uruguay a win over Spain.
abstract: Uruguay and France advance past quarterfinals at Under-20 World Cup soccer tournament.
lead_paragraph: France easily defeated Uzbekistan, cementing its status as one of the tournament favorites, and Felipe Avenatti scored in extra time to give Uruguay a win over Spain.

headline.main: France and Uruguay Reach Semifinals of Under-20 World Cup
